subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!
author: Sharron
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0695_01C820D7.A2F8A200
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi,

I am a newcomer...but not to the paranormal..I've been hooked as long =
as I can remember, from feelings of dejavu, to insisting to my parents that=
 I "saw" their wedding, I now believe i saw this from spirit realms (my mom=
 was pregnant with me)....it felt as though I was watching thier union from=
 an ex emplorary view point (like on widescrean HD, which did not exist in =
1968), I often asked about their "movie" to answers of : I dreamt it etc...=
.but I still remember being child like and asking parent like beings: is th=
at my parents?? I don't remeber a reply in words just an "undersatnding" ..=
.hence lots more has happened, and to cut a long story short my interest in=
 EVP and proof that we exist before birth and after death......

Sharron (A=
ustralia)  
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2007 11:42 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!



  Your right Frank, it all depends on expectatio=
ns and what degree of proof it will take for someone to accept the existenc=
e of the beyond and the entities who reside there. People all over the worl=
d scream for proof but yet if you ask them they cannot define what criteria=
 they require for proof. Why? Because they are so brainwashed in our societ=
ies materialistic teachings they never expect to receive proof, so they don=
't even bother to define such a criteria.

  Its amazing to me that a prima=
rily spiritual creature such as ourselves can deny our connections with tha=
t world and the source. The connections we experience everyday and at all t=
imes in the form of dreams, random thoughts and inspirations are so easily =
taken for granted and written off as figments of imagination, trivial thoug=
hts and meaningless aspirations. Even as a child I knew I was unique as was=
 every person on the face of the planet. I knew that their were as many per=
spectives of reality as their were people to have them and that each and ev=
ery one of them were just as valid as the other no matter how outlandish it=
 seemed to me.

  Acceptance was taught to me instead of beliefs. Beliefs c=
an enhance the truth but they are not in themselves true.

  More than I ex=
pected to write but I feel it is still valid,

  Best regards,

  Frank R.
=


  ----- Original Message ----
  From: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@hotmai=
l.com>
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, November 5, 2007 1:03:=
02 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!


   I'm not really discouraged exc=
ept by other people's expectation, and use of the box. It is all about lear=
ning, I don't think we're supposed, or can, get the proof on this level. I =
think in my next life I'm going to take journalism, cuz I certainly can't c=
ommunicate what my thoughts are. 
   
   Frank-S




    To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups .com
    From: bulletbabea@ yahoo.com
    Date: Mon, 5 Nov 2007 10:05=
:15 -0800
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!


    I was too tired to post=
 but I listened to those files last night. I heard the first eq file same a=
s you except one word...monday i heard as tuesday. When you got into slowin=
g it down etc that brought up different multilayers within so I heard some =
other stuff.

    I know how hard it is for you sometimes with what the guy=
s send ya. Thats why ya just have to take it as a grain of salt and use it =
as a learning experience rather than some profound truth being said all the=
 time.

    I dont let any of it discourage me, it all interests me instead=
. I dont get as much deception, but its happened in the past and usually th=
e others are quick to point out the deciever and remove them.

    Misty


=
    Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@ hotmail.com> wrote:
      This is what tr=
oubles me, I get these supposed Earthquake predictions, the last one fairly=
 specific, and --nothin'! It was supposed to be for China, today. That's wh=
at I try to get across, you can't take this shit like it's written in stone=
, or some kind of friggin' gospel, as most seem prone to do. So far, irrega=
rdless of how clear the voice is, or what method is used, the only thing th=
at can be said with certainty is that they consistently lie! Personally I s=
eem to get just enough "truth" to keep me hooked. I don't think you can say=
 with any certainty it's sprits of the deceased, at least not all of it, th=
ere's that level of deception that I don't kow what do to with. When someon=
e tells me they have the knowledge to know what questions to ask to verify =
the personality, I have to conclude they are absolutely clueless. I don't c=
are how many books they've written, or how many "universities" they've give=
n. When something knows how you think, what you are perceiving, and how it'=
s being perceived, you can't prevent yourself from being deceived, or more =
like played with. I know I'll be deceived, and tricked, and I tell them hav=
e fun with that, cuz I don't really care. I'm not after any particular spir=
it, or piece of knowledge.  
       
       When these voices tell someone =
not to share the information, that's even thinner ice to on!
       
      =
 I still, everyday, question the value of this work, and if it warrents con=
tinuing. I can do this on my own, but I don't want to drag the unitiated in=
to hell with me! I find the communication mode itself facsinating, and don'=
t expect that profound paranormal knowledge others seem to seek. I don't ca=
re who is talking through the box.  I think those seeking those bits of pro=
found knowledge, or secrets will get lead right down the rabbit hole. 
    =
   
       Frank-S
